description:
Did you know that corporations are literally “screwing” with your mind to get you to buy their products?

Corporations are spending a whopping $180 billion dollars per year to figure out how to sell their products to you.

And they're doing it with subliminal messages – without you even being aware of it!

Did you know that your life is mostly unfolding as a result of what's coming from your subconscious? Because of this fact it's imperative that you are in control of your mind, who feeds it and what it gets fed to. Your mind and your brain are your two most precious faculties. Treat them with care!

If you want to take back control and unplug from being fed subliminal messages to, then this course is for you.

What do you want to achieve?

  • More confidence and self-esteem
  • A lasting relationship
  • Public speaking skills
  • Freedom and peace
  • More income
  • Better health
  • A new house
  • More friends
  • What else?

Then this course is for you!

As a certified hypnotist and a business consultant working with presidents, CEOs and highly influential people, 80% of my work revolves around the mindset and attitude. With our minds being bombarded with negative subliminal messages that make us thirsty and hungry for commercialized products, it's important to what gets into our mind.

This course is filled with PowerPoint presentations, videos, documents, and pictures showing you just how corporations are manipulating your mind. You will get to look over my shoulders to see just how I set my affirmations on complete auto-pilot, and how you can do the same.

If you're ready to unplug and wake up and be in charge of your own mind, this course is for you!
title: Power Over Your Mind With Subliminal Messages & Affirmations
